What: Bruins Pub Crawl
When: Thursday, April 9th, 2009 4:30pm - 5:30pm START TIME
Where: Porters, The Greatest Bar, Johnnieâ€™s on the Side, TD Banknorth Garden
Price: VIP or Premium Tickets (CRAWL & GAME TICKET...prices change as the event draws near) CRAWL ONLY $25

** You must purchase tickets through the Anthem link.
DO NOT FORGET TO INCLUDE THIS NOTE IN THE SPECIAL COMMENTS BOX:
I am part of Amy Bernier's group. Here is the link: http://entertainment....

Enjoy the final home game of the season against the Montreal Canadiens with some added fun provided by Anthem Entertainment. Bar hop to three of Boston's best bars with no cover, no lines, and no waiting! There will be awesome raffle/auction items once again, door prizes for the first 100 patrons, a fan appreciation item at the Garden (while supplies last), and more! All ages are welcome on the pub crawl prior to the game, but after the game it will be fun for 21+ patrons only!


http://entertainment....

Our group will be following Option A:
* Stop 1: Porters (4:30-5:45pm)
* Stop 2: The Greatest Bar (3rd floor) (5:45-6:55pm)
* Stop 3: The Game (7pm-9:30pm estimate)
* Stop 4: Johnnies (9:30pm/immediately following game)

Everyone should print out their confirmation e-mail and bring it with them along with a photo ID. For multiple ticket orders, the person who's name is on the order will need to be present to check in their group and ONLY that person will be able to pick up the game tickets.

You will be able to check in at Porter's at the designated times. You will receive your wristbands, free raffle ticket, and Premium ticketholders will receive their 2 drink tickets (1 for The Greatest Bar, 1 for Johnnie's) upon check-in.

Drink tickets at The Greatest Bar can be redeemed for Bud Light drafts.
Complimentary appetizers will be served at Porters.
Everyone will receive their game tickets at The Greatest Bar (5:45-6:55pm).

There will be door prizes while supplies last and we have great raffle items including an autographed hockey stick by Marc Savard and a Zamboni ride in between periods next season. There will also be a silent auction for Bruins memorabilia. All raffle/auction winners will be announced at Johnnie's on the Side following the game.
